attributes.action: Ensure County Councils reinstate or maintain weekly general refuse collection during the Summer months
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current Alternate Weekly Collection arrangement adopted by many Councils poses a risk to Public health during the Summer months (May to August inc).
Many members of the public have experienced maggots and flies during hot periods with the obvious public health risk this creates.
We the signatories actively support recycling but feel that common sense should prevail.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
